verses.verse: For, <WH3588> behold,<WH2009> in those<WH1992> days,<WH3117> and in that<WH1931> time,<WH6256> when<WH834> I shall bring again<WH7725> <WH853> the captivity<WH7622> of Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem,<WH3389>

I will also gather<WH6908> <WH853> all<WH3605> nations,<WH1471> and will bring them down<WH3381> into<WH413> the valley<WH6010> of Jehoshaphat,<WH3092> and will plead<WH8199> with<WH5973> them there<WH8033> for<WH5921> my people<WH5971> and for my heritage<WH5159> Israel,<WH3478> whom<WH834> they have scattered<WH6340> among the nations,<WH1471> and parted<WH2505> my land.<WH776>

And they have cast<WH3032> lots<WH1486> for<WH413> my people;<WH5971> and have given<WH5414> a boy<WH3206> for a harlot,<WH2181> and sold<WH4376> a girl<WH3207> for wine,<WH3196> that they might drink.<WH8354>

Yea, <WH1571> and what<WH4100> have ye<WH859> to do with me, O Tyre,<WH6865> and Zidon,<WH6721> and all<WH3605> the coasts<WH1552> of Philistia?<WH6429> will ye<WH859> render<WH7999> <WH5921> me a recompense?<WH1576> and if<WH518> ye<WH859> recompense<WH1580> <WH5921> me, swiftly<WH7031> and speedily<WH4120> will I return<WH7725> your recompense<WH1576> upon your own head;<WH7218>
Because <WH834> ye have taken<WH3947> my silver<WH3701> and my gold,<WH2091> and have carried<WH935> into your temples<WH1964> my goodly<WH2896> pleasant things: <WH4261>

The children<WH1121> also of Judah<WH3063> and the children<WH1121> of Jerusalem<WH3389> have ye sold<WH4376> unto the Greeks,<WH1121> <WH3125> that<WH4616> ye might remove them far<WH7368> from<WH4480> <WH5921> their border.<WH1366>

Behold, <WH2009> I will raise<WH5782> them out of<WH4480> the place<WH4725> whither<WH834> <WH8033> ye have sold<WH4376> them, and will return<WH7725> your recompense<WH1576> upon your own head: <WH7218>

And I will sell<WH4376> <WH853> your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> into the hand<WH3027> of the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> and they shall sell<WH4376> them to the Sabeans,<WH7615> to<WH413> a people<WH1471> far off:<WH7350> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> hath spoken<WH1696> it.

Proclaim <WH7121> ye this<WH2063> among the Gentiles;<WH1471> Prepare<WH6942> war,<WH4421> wake up<WH5782> the mighty men,<WH1368> let all<WH3605> the men<WH376> of war<WH4421> draw near;<WH5066> let them come up: <WH5927>
Beat <WH3807> your plowshares<WH855> into swords,<WH2719> and your pruning hooks<WH4211> into spears:<WH7420> let the weak<WH2523> say,<WH559> I<WH589> am strong.<WH1368>

Assemble <WH5789> yourselves, and come,<WH935> all<WH3605> ye heathen,<WH1471> and gather yourselves together<WH6908> round about:<WH4480> <WH5439> thither<WH8033> cause thy mighty ones<WH1368> to come down,<WH5181> O LORD.<WH3068>

Let the heathen<WH1471> be wakened,<WH5782> and come up<WH5927> to<WH413> the valley<WH6010> of Jehoshaphat:<WH3092> for<WH3588> there<WH8033> will I sit<WH3427> to judge<WH8199> <WH853> all<WH3605> the heathen<WH1471> round about.<WH4480> <WH5439>

Put <WH7971> ye in the sickle,<WH4038> for<WH3588> the harvest<WH7105> is ripe:<WH1310> come,<WH935> get you down;<WH3381> for<WH3588> the press<WH1660> is full,<WH4390> the fats<WH3342> overflow;<WH7783> for<WH3588> their wickedness<WH7451> is great.<WH7227>
Multitudes, <WH1995> multitudes<WH1995> in the valley<WH6010> of decision:<WH2742> for<WH3588> the day<WH3117> of the LORD<WH3068> is near<WH7138> in the valley<WH6010> of decision.<WH2742>
The sun<WH8121> and the moon<WH3394> shall be darkened,<WH6937> and the stars<WH3556> shall withdraw<WH622> their shining.<WH5051>

The LORD<WH3068> also shall roar<WH7580> out of Zion,<WH4480> <WH6726> and utter<WH5414> his voice<WH6963> from Jerusalem;<WH4480> <WH3389> and the heavens<WH8064> and the earth<WH776> shall shake:<WH7493> but the LORD<WH3068> will be the hope<WH4268> of his people,<WH5971> and the strength<WH4581> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

So shall ye know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> dwelling<WH7931> in Zion,<WH6726> my holy<WH6944> mountain:<WH2022> then shall Jerusalem<WH3389> be<WH1961> holy,<WH6944> and there shall no<WH3808> strangers<WH2114> pass through<WH5674> her any more.<WH5750>

And it shall come to pass<WH1961> in that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> that the mountains<WH2022> shall drop down<WH5197> new wine,<WH6071> and the hills<WH1389> shall flow<WH1980> with milk,<WH2461> and all<WH3605> the rivers<WH650> of Judah<WH3063> shall flow<WH1980> with waters,<WH4325> and a fountain<WH4599> shall come forth<WH3318> of the house<WH4480> <WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> and shall water<WH8248> <WH853> the valley<WH5158> of Shittim.<WH7851>

Egypt <WH4714> shall be<WH1961> a desolation,<WH8077> and Edom<WH123> shall be<WH1961> a desolate<WH8077> wilderness,<WH4057> for<WH4480> the violence<WH2555> against the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> because<WH834> they have shed<WH8210> innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> in their land.<WH776>
But Judah<WH3063> shall dwell<WH3427> forever,<WH5769> and Jerusalem<WH3389> from generation<WH1755> to generation.<WH1755>
For I will cleanse<WH5352> their blood<WH1818> that I have not<WH3808> cleansed:<WH5352> for the LORD<WH3068> dwelleth<WH7931> in Zion.<WH6726>
